content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the case involved party a and party b but their identities are not provided the summary of the case is as follows 1 party a initiated the case against party b 2 party a requested certain documents from party b 3 the court granted party as request and ordered party b to produce the documents 4 party b did not comply with the courts order and failed to produce the documents 5 party a filed a motion for sanctions against party b for their noncompliance 6 the court held a hearing to consider party as motion for sanctions 7 the court found party b in contempt for not complying with the courts order 8 the court imposed sanctions on party b including fines and additional requirements 9 party b was given a deadline to comply with the courts order and provide the requested documents 10 a followup hearing was scheduled to review party bs compliance with the courts order the final resolution of the case involves the division of matrimonial property specifically a vw passat vehicle the vehicle was acquired during the marriage and party a referred to as ms lk wishes to keep it party b referred to as vk objects to the division of the property and proposes a counterclaim regarding the car the court will further review the case to determine the division of assets the text also mentions that the marriage between lk and vk is being dissolved due to fault and the state will be responsible for paying the costs of the legal proceedings
